Name: Edge of Reality
About the game: Edge of Reality is an interactive visual novel. It seems that there can be no more boring profession in the world than an appraiser in a pawnshop. But meeting with a mysterious young lady brings one such appraiser through a series of strange events, changing Danâ€™s initial perspective about his craft. In this game, immerse yourself in an intricate story, where dreams and reality are intertwined into a single whole. Where, at some point, reality itself may lose its stability. Feature of game: - Non-linear passage, and unexpected plot twists; - Unique visual style; - Music written specifically for this game, allows you to fully convey the atmosphere. If you study one of the suggested languages, you have the opportunity to test your skills in the game. A unique additional bilingual reading mode will help you to have both fun and profit. You can assign any pair of languages available in the game. Edge of Reality is a mystery story dictated by logical deduction. Its completion depends on your choices, and yours alone.
